attributes.action: to discontinue all discussions, with President G. W. Bush & the government of the USA, concerning the establishment of foreign anti-missile bases in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to convince the present & future governments of the UK (and of the EEC)that the 'Star Wars'anti missile sites should not be allowed in the UK or any of our colonies, protectorates, etc or in the EEC.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
